name: Surface (Epipelagic Zone)
fact: The ocean surface is teeming with life.

name: Sunlight Zone (Epipelagic Zone)
fact: This zone receives the most sunlight, allowing photosynthesis.

name: Twilight Zone (Mesopelagic Zone)
fact: Sunlight barely penetrates here, so plants cannot grow.

name: Midnight Zone (Bathypelagic Zone)
fact: This zone is in complete darkness and under immense pressure. Many animals are bioluminescent.

name: Abyss (Abyssopelagic Zone)
fact: Few creatures can survive the extreme cold and pressure of the abyss.

name: The Trenches (Hadalpelagic Zone)
fact: This is the deepest part of the ocean, found in oceanic trenches.

name: Challenger Deep
fact: The Challenger Deep is the deepest known point in the Earth's seabed hydrosphere.
